Articles.Content:
Challenge: load the provided save file and use the ship that already is in Mun orbit to land on one of the mun arches.

Savefile

Rules:

-you are not allowed to launch any other ship

-no mods/addons

-no debug menu

Only a few screenshots are required and I'll make a list with everyone that succeeded. I would request a video since it's very easy to cheat this with the debug menu, but I guess no one will post videos, so a few screenshots are enough. Maybe if enough people are joining and are willing to make videos, we can make a leaderboard based on the fuel left.

Example video

In the video I land on the Neil Armstrong memorial, which is much harder than landing on the arch.

Challenge accomplished by:

Aphobius

Edited January 23, 2014 by Aphobius
The thrust of your ship is so low, it's already a challenge to land it on the Mun.

I gave this a few tries. Got below 100m/s before crashing. May try it again but it's a bit of a time sink having to slow down for 8 minutes. Even on 4x speed that's 2 minutes per failed try. It doesn't seem like much but it adds up when all I'm doing is watching the thing slow down.

Thank you for trying my challenge guys.

Here's a picture from me.

I've posted a

in my first post.
